item.title: Crime and Punishment
item.description: Summary For those who don’t want to read the entire book, there are summaries. With a lively narrator (2019, 13 m), in brief English (2018, 3 m), or illustrated Russian (2017, 9 m), and also with Playmobil (2015, 11 m).
